text: Write the code as if it will be accompanied by a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
author: Steve McConnell

text: The complexity of the program grows until it exceeds the capabilities of the programmer
author: Arthur Bloch. Murphy's Laws

text: Walking on water and developing programs following the TOR is very easy ... if they are frozen
author: I. Berard

text: I've always wanted my computer to be as easy to use as my phone. My dream has come true, because now I don't understand how to use my phone.
author: Bjorn Stroustrup

text: Enjoy what you do and you will never work in your life.
author: Bill Gates

text: Success is a lousy teacher. He makes smart people think they can't lose.
author: Bill Gates

text: The computer is the most amazing tool I have ever encountered. This is a bicycle for our consciousness
author: Steve Jobs
